author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
There are several reasons Kamala lost the election. One of them is that no one elected her in the first place. However, the victim of the de facto coup seems to forget that little detail, which is unsurprising considering he’s a sleeping potato. Nonetheless, he has since gotten the idea in his head that the reason she is not the POTUS is because of insignificant birth traits. Thus, he has once again decided to slander half the country without the least bit of evidence to back up his claims.

Sleepy Joe appeared on T
title: Joe Biden's "The View" interview is such a trainwreck, his caregiver Jill saves him from questions on his mental decline

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
When it comes to the Department of Justice and Attorney General Pam Bondi, there has been some good and there has been some bad. Today’s show grades Bondi’s performance so far, and it was not on a curve.

“Trust is at an all-time low — that’s why these people were put in. But nothing is really happening on that front,” Crowder said. “We’re not seeing it.”

According to the DOJ, “Fed
title: Watch: An Honest Review of Pam Bondi's Performance as AG So Far

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
If climate change is such an inevitable, catastrophic event, as people like AOC and Bernie Sanders claim it is, then they would admittedly refuse to even think about flying private. However, coincidentally, it just so happens that the more left someone is, the more of a raging hypocrite they become. This is why Bernie Sanders and AOC must be called out for spending just shy of a quarter of a million dollars flying on private jets to fight the invisible threat of an oligarchy.

In his defense, Sanders said he couldn't fly like the little people, despite his Socialist stance for the rest of us, and that he has “no apologies.”

NEW: Socialist Bernie Sanders says he has to spend $221,000 on private jets to "fight the oligarchy," scoffs at the thought of flying on a commer
title: Bernie Sanders seethes when called out as a hypocrite for criss-crossing America on a private jet

author: Brodigan
description:
Paramount strikes again. Times Square gets a brand new art project. Are we seeing plans for Disneyland Abu Dhabi? President Donald Trump has announced that there will be a major trade announcement today. It looks like Trump has made his first big trade deal. Who’s it with? The world wants to know. The FBI made some big busts, more and more fentanyl is getting taken off the streets and illegal aliens are getting deported. But, it’s not all sunshine and roses for the Trump Administration’s Department of Justice. We’re going to grade Attorney General Pam Bondi’s performance so far, and we’re not grading on a curve.

TRUMP’S FIRST TRADE DEAL</
title: Trump Announces Major Trade Deal: What This Means For The Global Trade War (Sources)

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
One day, the left decided that women are no longer worthy of their division in sports and must prove their worth by competing against the opposite gender. And even though cavemen knew how foolish and deranged that concept would have been, progressives don’t really care about this thing called “biology.” Thus, women are fighting every day to uphold the integrity of the game.

Stephanie Turner, a fencing player who was recently forced to forfeit against a male opponent, testified in front of a DOGE Subcommittee at a hearing on “Unfair Play: Keeping Men Out of Women’s Sports.”

TESTIMONY: “I have decided to step away from the sport I love, at least for now, because USA Fencing has fostered an environment where I am unwelcome in my own category. It is culturally acceptabl
title: Female fencer who refused to be bullied into getting maimed by trans opponent gives powerful Congressional testimony

author: Brodigan
description:
Instead of sticking to movies that teach boss babes their big city lives are incomplete without a man in it, Hallmark is involving itself in the trade war. Stores are handing out price increase sheets due to Trump's tariffs. Here's the rub, though... aren't their products made in Kansas? As in, the Kansas that is in America and wouldn't be subject to tariffs? That's what TikToker "Prevent & Limit" thought, so she inquired.

Before we get started, let's file this under "for content purposes only." Not that other companies aren't pledging to raise prices. But there was already a brouhaha over Amazon showing the alleged tariff costs that turned out to be fake news. Or,
title: Is Hallmark raising its AMERICAN MADE prices due to tariffs? According to this TikToker... yes
